definition: to thank/to apologize/to wither (of flowers, leaves etc)/to decline

apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc

sentences.english: At 37, Nisan is already balding, and his remaining hair has gone gray.
sentences.chinese: 尼森37岁，已经谢顶，剩下的头发也发了灰。

sentences.english: Whether we be old and bald.
sentences.chinese: 不论偶们是谢顶地老人。

sentences.english: If you are sixteen or under, try not to go bald.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是十六岁或以下，尽量别谢顶。

sentences.english: A balding solicitor who got her pregnant then left.
sentences.chinese: 有个谢顶的推销员把她弄怀了孕后离开。

sentences.english: He was thinner, balder , and grayer, and his face had a crumpled look.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个瘦弱的，谢顶的老人，他的脸上不满了皱纹。

definition: baldness/to lose hair or feathers/to molt/depilation
to be balding/to be thinning on top
to put on weight/to get fat (a sign of prosperity, so a compliment)
